questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Urban scenery with a kite

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The buildings
B) The kite stuck in the tree
C) The people
D) The ocean

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A tall building
C) A kite
D) A body of water

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Tall buildings
C) A forest
D) A lake

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A tree with a kite stuck in it
C) A car
D) A bench

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Blue
D) Green

What type of buildings are in the background?
A) Residential houses
B) Skyscrapers
C) Historical monuments
D) Small shops

What is the color of the kite in the photo?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and white
C) Green and pink
D) White with green tails

What is the state of the kite in the photo?
A) Flying freely
B) Stuck in the tree
C) Lying on the ground
D) Being held by a person

What is the color of the buildings in the background?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) White and gray
D) Black and brown

What is the material of the kite?
A) Paper
B) Plastic
C) Cloth
D) Metal

How many buildings are prominently visible in the background?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Multiple

What is the color of the leaves on the tree?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Brown

What is the shape of the kite?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Orthodiagonal quadrilateral
D) Rectangular

What is the position of the kite relative to the tree?
A) Above the tree
B) Below the tree
C) Stuck in the branches
D) Next to the tree

Which direction is the kite tail flowing?
A) Upwards
B) Downwards
C) To the left
D) To the right

What is the relationship between the tree and the kite?
A) The kite is flying above the tree
B) The kite is stuck in the tree
C) The kite is lying under the tree
D) The kite is tied to the tree

What is the primary color of the sky?
A) Blue
B) Gray
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the condition of the grass in the photo?
A) Lush and green
B) Dry and brown
C) Covered in snow
D) Not visible

What is the color of the tree bark?
A) White
B) Brown
C) Black
D) Gray

What is the condition of the buildings in the background?
A) Under construction
B) Fully constructed
C) Partially demolished
D) Abandoned

What is the primary color of the kite tail?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye level
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What is the primary feature of the tree in the foreground?
A) Its height
B) Its leaves
C) Its branches
D) Its flowers

What is the relationship between the buildings and the tree?
A) The buildings are behind the tree
B) The buildings are in front of the tree
C) The buildings are beside the tree
D) The buildings are above the tree
